title: gRPC client configuration bug Quarkus 2.16.7 Final

labels.name: triage/out-of-date
labels.description: This issue/PR is no longer valid or relevant

body:
### Describe the bug

grpc application property idle-timeout is not correcly mapped in configuration Channels class
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/60628480/f513a26a-2591-4cac-98c6-76966fc31098)
io.quarkus.grpc.runtime.supports.Channels
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/60628480/ea1bf4ec-7969-4cb2-bc6c-b4424f3c5d86)

It is fixed in Quarkus 3+. But that will be great to fix it in old Quarkus version.

_No response_

_No response_
